name: Mongodb app
tagline: Testing out MongoDB's NoSQL features and integration with the WPF platform.
body:
### Welcome to MongoDB App
This app was developed on the WPF platform, in order to demonstrate CRUD operations on a remote Mongo db instance.
Feel free to contribute to this project, or suggest new features.


### Authors and Contributors
@BrianJVarley - Brian Varley 


### Support or Contact
Having trouble with this application. Check out the project README or [contact support](brianvarley9@gmail.com) and I'll try y best to sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
